CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to input items for the sidebar navigation.

CustomProperties.Name: PwCLogo
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to insert a custom PwC logo.

CustomProperties.Name: HeaderText
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to alter the header text.

CustomProperties.Name: PrimaryOrange
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to toggle the primary color for the user icon.

CustomProperties.Name: ExpandButtonOnSelect
CustomProperties.Tooltip: Use this property to set the visibility of the expanded/collapsed sidebars to change when the button is pressed.

CustomProperties.Name: Solid
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to toggle between the background.

CustomProperties.Name: ShowSidebarHeading
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to toggle the heading of the sidebar.

CustomProperties.Name: UseCustomIcons
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to toggle the use of custom icons.

CustomProperties.Name: DefaultParentItem
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to set the default selected parent item.

CustomProperties.Name: ShowCollapseButton
CustomProperties.Tooltip: A custom property to toggle the visibility of the collapse button.

Rules.InvariantScript: If(showSidebaritems = Blank(), Set(showSidebaritems, true), Set(showSidebaritems, true)); If(IsBlank(ThisItem.SubMenu), Navigate(ThisItem.Screen) && Set(showSidebaritems, false))
If(ThisItem.ShowDropDown = true, ThisItem.IsSelected && showSidebaritems = true, false)
